experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experiences.description: Web application development using React, Next.js and Node.js. Implementation of scalable architectures and maintenance of existing systems. Collaboration with design and product teams to create exceptional user experiences.

experiences.title: Front-end Developer
experiences.description: Creation of responsive and accessible user interfaces. Implementation of designs using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Web application performance optimization and collaboration on e-commerce projects.

experiences.title: Junior Web Developer
experiences.description: Development of user interface components. Maintenance of existing websites and collaboration in the implementation of new features.
